extendedInfo.description: If you never think of changing browser, think again! In just few weeks after the release, 1 million users have started experiencing this mini, beautiful, easy-to-use and ultra fast web browser ---- Another work from GO Launcher team. From now on, browse web faster, more private and more secure. â  User Reviews"Easily the best browser I have ever used. It's fast, voice recognition is awesome, and the entire layout is beautiful. Reminds me of a chrome and dolphin mashup with 10 times the speed. Love this browser keep up the good work :-)" - Ash B"At first I was very sceptical about this browser, considering the fact that I've tried pretty much every browser out there, but after trying it I was truly blown away by the slickness and the skied speed of the browser." - Argjent Gigollaj"This browser made me think what in the world are other browser makers doing. What in the world are they really doing? There is nothing better and more functional and beautiful than this app at the moment. I dont have words about how good it is and how well it performs. HATS OFF!!" - Syed Jalalâ  All features are FREE for this mini browser - Customizable home screen for quick accessing to your favorite sites- Switch between tabs with simple gesture- Next View: read the latest news, sports, entertainment and more updates by free subscription- Various plugin add-ons (Evernote, Facebook, Pocket,QR code, Screenshot, PDF) to extend functionality without limitation- Import and sync chrome bookmarks- Secure browse web in incognito modeâ  Follow UsFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/NextBrowserForAndroidTwitter: https://twitter.com/NextBrowserGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/109090875597829388173/postsYouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/NextBrowserâ  Contact UsEmailï¼nextbrowserfeedback@gmail.comOur websiteï¼http://nextbrowser.goforandroid.comWe are using Crowdin to translate Next Browser. reviews.title: A Must Have
reviews.comment: Great browser for daily use. Very responsive and sexy. Only thing I don\'t like is when going back to a previous page it brings you to the top of the page Instead of the point you were at before you clicked a link. Also this browser works flawlessly with flash player.
reviews.author: Giovanni Botta

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Very good brawoser for my micromax phone.
reviews.author: Raj Kumar

reviews.title: Very good browser
reviews.comment: This browser has improved a lot from the first time it came out. The UI is quite innovative and it is feature-rich. I also like the exit setting feature that was recently added up. I still think the speed can use some improvement. Backward and forward page switching should be instantaneous instead of having to reload the page altogether. Very good job, another gem on the Android Market.
reviews.author: Patrick Beausejour

reviews.title: Great browser. Works with Flash player!
reviews.comment: Alone for the use of flash this is already hands down better than almost all other browsers. It is made better still by it\'s speed, good looks and extra options. If it was not due that I need \'phone to chrome\' to work, I would get rid of Chrome.
reviews.author: Mauricio Alas

reviews.title: Fast response
reviews.comment: Recommended browser
reviews.author: Sandy Banyu Aji

reviews.title: Superb.
reviews.comment: Very good browser for my Micromax canvas hand set.. love it..
reviews.author: kudva ganesh

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: It stops at loading page I am waiting for 5 minutes and still it was loading evev I am was working in WiFi fix this developers

reviews.comment: This is by far the best browser!

reviews.comment: Just keeps getting better!

reviews.title: Remarkable
reviews.comment: A browser that fulfill all our needs . Quietly brilliant

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: So far it\'s good. Having a nice experience using this browser. Hope future updates don\'t mess it up =)
reviews.author: MJ Quintana

reviews.title: Best browser
reviews.comment: This is the best browser In the Play Store it has everything I need but i want the option to keep the screen on when watching something.
reviews.author: Bilel Boulila

reviews.title: Great default browser
reviews.comment: Or that is what it should be. Easy enabling/extensions, switching/creating tabs. Fast loading. This is how Chrome should be in a lot of ways!
reviews.author: Chris Druif

reviews.comment: Plz fix for five stars!

reviews.comment: Very smooth and highly responsive browser

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: Fast and all you need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Competition ahead of you.
reviews.comment: Right now I can see that this app is in real competition with another popular app \342\200\224 Dolphin Browser. I am using this app instead only because I am a huge fan of the \"Go Apps\" I.e. GO LAUNCHER! Keep up the high performance Go team ;-)
reviews.author: Chisom Oguibe

reviews.title: Great browser
reviews.comment: Great browser. It has now replaced Firefox as my go-to browser. Visually stunning app.
reviews.author: Mike C

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works great! So far no complaint. My browser of choice for android.
